description: News By Linkboard enables you to search the news and have articles read to you. Say, "Alexa, start Linkboard" and you can then search, have headlines read out to you and hear any article read out to you by Alexa.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Linkboard to search news about [a topic].
Alexa, ask Linkboard what's today's trending news?
name: News By Linkboard
shortDescription: News By Linkboard enables you to search the news and have articles read to you. Say, "Alexa, start Linkboard" to try.
